statements: SELECT id, data_source_1_column_1, data_source_1_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view;
SELECT data_source_2_column_1, data_source_2_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view;
SELECT id, data_source_1_column_1, data_source_2_column_1 FROM datasource_unified_view;
SELECT data_source_1_column_2, data_source_2_column_1, data_source_2_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view;
SELECT * FROM datasource_unified_view ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data_source_1_column_1, data_source_1_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data_source_1_column_1, data_source_1_column_2, data_source_2_column_1, data_source_2_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view WHERE data_source_1_column_2 > 100;
SELECT id, data_source_2_column_1, data_source_2_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view WHERE data_source_2_column_2 BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT id, data_source_1_column_2 FROM datasource_unified_view WHERE data_source_1_column_2 < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM datasource_unified_view WHERE data_source_1_column_1 LIKE '%example%' OR data_source_2_column_1 LIKE '%sample%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_source_1;
SELECT name, age FROM data_source_1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, address FROM data_source_2;
SELECT * FROM data_source_2 WHERE salary >= 50000;
SELECT id, name, age, address, salary FROM data_source_1 JOIN data_source_2 ON data_source_1.id = data_source_2.id;
SELECT * FROM data_source_1 WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM data_source_2 WHERE salary >= 50000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, age, address FROM data_source_1 INNER JOIN data_source_2 ON data_source_1.id = data_source_2.id WHERE age < 40;
SELECT id, name, salary FROM data_source_2 WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT id, name, age, salary FROM data_source_1, data_source_2 WHERE data_source_1.id = data_source_2.id ORDER BY age DESC, salary ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_source1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM data_source1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM data_source1 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT salary, address FROM data_source2 WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT id, name, salary, address FROM unified_view WHERE salary < 70000;
SELECT name, age FROM data_source1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, salary FROM unified_view WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_source2 WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, salary, address FROM unified_view WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND salary > 40000;
SELECT name, salary FROM unified_view WHERE address IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') AND age < 40 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_source_1;
SELECT name, age FROM data_source_2;
SELECT department, position FROM data_source_3;
SELECT id, name, date_of_birth FROM unified_data;
SELECT salary, location FROM unified_data;
SELECT id, name, age, location FROM data_source_1;
SELECT date_of_birth, email, phone_number FROM data_source_2 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT department, position, salary FROM data_source_3 WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT id, name, age, location, email FROM unified_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM unified_data WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM data_source_1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, data_1 FROM data_source_1 WHERE data_1 > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM data_source_2 WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, category FROM data_source_3 WHERE category LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM unified_data_view WHERE data_source_1_id = 2 AND data_source_2_id = 5 OR data_source_3_id = 10;
SELECT id, name, data_1 FROM data_source_1 WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_2 FROM data_source_2 WHERE data_2 > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, category, data_3 FROM data_source_3 WHERE category LIKE '%tech%' ORDER BY data_3 ASC;
SELECT unified_data FROM unified_data_view WHERE data_source_1_id = 5 OR data_source_2_id = 7;
SELECT id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date;
